❤️【泰國鳳凰】 PIYAHONG

富貴榮華、添貴氣、增人緣、開財運。

This Sak Yant Piyahong means King of the Golden Swans. Legend has it that the Lord Buddha, in a previous life as Bodhisattva Siddhartha Gotama, was born as a beautiful Golden Swan called Dhatarath and had over 90,000 swans as followers.
The Golden Swan is a symbol of kindness, gentleness, richness and happiness. One of the Royal Barges in Thailand, the Suphannahongse has a Golden Swan as the figurehead on its bow.
